blog.description: Writing and Stuff from Isaac Z. Schlueter
blog.name: izs
blog.title: blog.izs.me

caption: Dan Ariely talks about a few of the ways in which we demonstrate that we don’t know why we do the things we do. Key takeaway: when picking up strangers, bring someone who looks just like you, but just a little uglier.

reblog.comment: Dan Ariely talks about a few of the ways in which we demonstrate that we don’t know why we do the things we do. Key takeaway: when picking up strangers, bring someone who looks just like you, but just a little uglier.
